tag_list: business-development, international, software, e-learning, elearning, distance-learning
overview:
Business Oriented Industrial Engineering Professional with twenty years of experience, especially in IT & Jewelry Sectors, serving as executive & strategic consultant. Gabriel is known for his ability to conduct effective verbal, written & virtual negotiations in English, Spanish & Hebrew.

Currently Gabriel is running his own training and mentoring firm. The Company is focused in training international sales teams.one of the activities is AMLATIS - the Latin America & Israel Business Facilitation Service.

Gabriel served as International Manager of Edusoft LTD. - a leading e-learning provider operating in more than 70 countries, 27 localizations, having more then 5 million users worldwide.

Hayon was the Vice President of Business Development & Operations for the Cyber Park of Santo Domingo - the flagship high-tech industrial free zone, located in the Dominican Republic.
